leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 化学信息-分子表示与检索生态
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 表示库 + 向量检索 + index

queries: [WEB] graph neural networks chemistry datasets github
[WEB] AI for science chemistry benchmarks github

tools.name: SLM4Mol
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for evaluating molecular large language models
tools.detailed_description: A quantitative benchmark and analysis framework designed to evaluate the performance of large language models on molecular tasks.

tools.name: MOFSimBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for ML interatomic potentials in MOF modeling
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite for evaluating universal machine learning interatomic potentials specifically for metal-organic framework (MOF) molecular modeling.

tools.name: GuacaMol
tools.one_line_profile: Standardized benchmarks for de novo molecular design
tools.detailed_description: An evaluation framework for generative chemistry models, providing a suite of standardized benchmarks to assess the quality and diversity of generated molecules.

tools.name: GuacaMol Baselines
tools.one_line_profile: Baseline models for the GuacaMol benchmark
tools.detailed_description: A collection of baseline generative models implemented for comparison within the GuacaMol benchmarking framework.

tools.name: MolGenBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for real-world molecular generation applicability
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite designed to evaluate the applicability of molecular generative models in real-world drug discovery scenarios, from de novo design to lead optimization.

tools.name: PoseX
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for molecular docking and pose prediction
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark dataset and evaluation tool for molecular docking and pose prediction tasks.

tools.name: TorchDrug
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning platform for drug discovery and graph reasoning
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive machine learning platform designed for drug discovery, covering graph representation learning, generative molecule modeling, and property prediction.

tools.name: DBFC Dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset for Direct Borohydride Fuel Cells research
tools.detailed_description: A dataset containing experimental data for Direct Borohydride Fuel Cells (DBFC), useful for modeling and analysis.

tools.name: PEM Fuel Cell Dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset for Proton Exchange Membrane Fuel Cells
tools.detailed_description: A dataset focused on Proton Exchange Membrane (PEM) fuel cells, supporting research in energy conversion and storage modeling.

tools.name: MatDeepLearn
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural networks package for materials chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A library for applying graph neural networks to materials chemistry tasks, such as property prediction and structure analysis.

tools.name: Ether
tools.one_line_profile: Scientific reasoning model and dataset for chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A scientific reasoning model, accompanied by datasets and reward functions, specifically tailored for chemistry tasks.

tools.name: Molecules Dataset Collection
tools.one_line_profile: Curated collection of molecular datasets for property inference
tools.detailed_description: A repository collecting various molecular datasets intended for validating and benchmarking molecular property inference models.

tools.name: SMILES-X
tools.one_line_profile: Autonomous molecular characterization tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the autonomous characterization of molecular compounds from small datasets using SMILES strings, without requiring explicit descriptors.

tools.name: AToM-OpenMM
tools.one_line_profile: Alchemical Transfer Method framework for OpenMM
tools.detailed_description: An OpenMM-based framework for performing absolute and relative binding free energy calculations using the Alchemical Transfer Method (ATM).

tools.name: MolCap-Arena
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for molecular captioning and language-enhanced prediction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmarking repository for evaluating models on language-enhanced molecular property prediction and molecular captioning tasks.

tools.name: MD-Bench
tools.one_line_profile: Performance benchmarking harness for molecular dynamics algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A performance-oriented prototyping harness designed to benchmark and evaluate state-of-the-art Molecular Dynamics algorithms, facilitating HPC optimization.

tools.name: SELFormer
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular representation learning via SELFIES language models
tools.detailed_description: A molecular representation learning framework that leverages SELFIES language models to generate chemical embeddings for downstream tasks.

tools.name: otter-knowledge
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge-enhanced representation learning for drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: A library that enriches protein sequence and SMILES drug databases with a large Knowledge Graph to improve drug target binding affinity prediction.

tools.name: ChemCoTBench
tools.one_line_profile: LLM reasoning benchmark and Chain-of-Thoughts dataset for chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark and dataset designed to evaluate the reasoning capabilities of Large Language Models in the domain of chemistry using Chain-of-Thoughts.

tools.name: fastprop
tools.one_line_profile: Fast molecular property prediction tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for rapid molecular property prediction utilizing the mordredcommunity descriptors, designed for efficiency and ease of use.

tools.name: MolPuzzle
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal benchmark for molecular structure elucidation
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark dataset designed to evaluate if Large Language Models can solve molecule puzzles, focusing on molecular structure elucidation tasks.

tools.name: MolData
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for disease and target based molecular machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive molecular benchmark dataset tailored for disease and target-based machine learning tasks in drug discovery.

tools.name: Foundry
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for ML-ready datasets in materials science and chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A tool and platform designed to simplify the discovery, access, and usage of machine-learning ready datasets specifically for materials science and chemistry.

tools.name: MolPROP
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular property prediction via fused language and graph representations
tools.detailed_description: A molecular property prediction model that fuses molecular language and graph representations to achieve enhanced predictive performance.

tools.name: Matcher
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for analyzing chemical structure optimization and SAR
tools.detailed_description: A web application and tool for understanding how chemical structure optimization problems have been solved, enabling deep control over searching structure/activity relationships (SAR).

tools.name: alchemical-analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis tool for alchemical free energy calculations
tools.detailed_description: An open tool implementing recommended practices for analyzing alchemical free energy calculations in computational chemistry.

tools.name: GraphINVENT
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural networks for molecular design
tools.detailed_description: A platform using graph neural networks for graph-based molecular design and generation.

tools.name: MolScore
tools.one_line_profile: Automated scoring function for de novo molecular design
tools.detailed_description: An automated scoring function designed to facilitate and standardize the evaluation of goal-directed generative models for de novo molecular design.

tools.name: KERMT
tools.one_line_profile: Pretrained GNN model for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A pretrained graph neural network model specifically designed for molecular property prediction tasks.

tools.name: ProfBench
tools.one_line_profile: Expert-annotated rubrics dataset for science domains
tools.detailed_description: A PhD/MBA-level human-annotated rubrics dataset covering Physics, Chemistry, Finance, and Consulting, serving as a benchmark for expert-level reasoning.

tools.name: LLM4Chem
tools.one_line_profile: Instruction tuning dataset and resources for chemistry LLMs
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive instruction tuning dataset (LlaSMol) and associated code designed to advance Large Language Models' capabilities in chemistry tasks.

tools.name: paccmann_datasets
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch dataset classes for PaccMann drug sensitivity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A library providing specialized PyTorch dataset implementations for handling drug sensitivity data, supporting the PaccMann ecosystem.

tools.name: PickyBinder
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking workflow for molecular docking tools
tools.detailed_description: A workflow designed to benchmark various molecular docking tools, facilitating the evaluation of docking performance and accuracy.

tools.name: uq_molecule
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty quantification for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing Bayesian deep learning methods to quantify uncertainty in molecular property predictions.

tools.name: mol_property
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning based pKa prediction tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting pKa values from chemical structures using machine learning approaches and molecular similarity.

tools.name: HimGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical molecular representation learning framework
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the HimGNN model for molecular property prediction, utilizing a hierarchical approach to learn molecular representations.

tools.name: SGGRL
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-modal molecular representation learning model
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of SGGRL, a framework integrating sequence, graph, and geometry information for molecular property prediction.

tools.name: GeminiMol
tools.one_line_profile: Conformational space-aware molecular representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A molecular representation learning tool that incorporates conformational space profiles, applicable to virtual screening and target identification.

tools.name: Ouroboros
tools.one_line_profile: Generative model for directed chemical evolution
tools.detailed_description: A foundational model for drug discovery that bridges representation learning and generative AI to navigate molecular encoding space.

tools.name: SigmaCCS
tools.one_line_profile: Collision cross section prediction with GNN
tools.detailed_description: A graph neural network-based tool for highly accurate and large-scale prediction of collision cross sections (CCS) for compound identification.

tools.name: HM-GNN
tools.one_line_profile: Heterogeneous Motif Graph Neural Networks for molecules
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of HM-GNN, a method for molecular representation learning that leverages heterogeneous motif graphs.

tools.name: FraGAT
tools.one_line_profile: Fragment-oriented multi-scale graph attention model
tools.detailed_description: A multi-scale graph attention network (FraGAT) designed for molecular property prediction by focusing on molecular fragments.

tools.name: chemprop
tools.one_line_profile: Message Passing Neural Networks for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A fast and scalable framework for training Message Passing Neural Networks (MPNNs) for molecular property prediction, including uncertainty quantification.

tools.name: GeomGCL
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric Graph Contrastive Learning for molecules
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of GeomGCL, a geometric graph contrastive learning method for enhancing molecular property prediction.

tools.name: molgraph
tools.one_line_profile: GNNs for molecular machine learning in TensorFlow/Keras
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing Graph Neural Networks for molecular machine learning, fully compatible with TensorFlow and Keras APIs.

tools.name: Tartarus
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking platform for realistic inverse molecular design
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking platform designed to evaluate realistic and practical inverse molecular design models, focusing on optimizability, diversity, and property prediction in chemical space.

tools.name: dionysus
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis tool for probabilistic molecular models
tools.detailed_description: A library for analyzing the calibration, performance, and generalizability of probabilistic models trained on small molecular datasets, aiding in the evaluation of uncertainty quantification.

tools.name: DGL-LifeSci
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural network package for chemistry and biology
tools.detailed_description: A python package based on Deep Graph Library (DGL) for applying graph neural networks to tasks in chemistry and biology, including molecular property prediction, generation, and reaction prediction.

tools.name: Graph Network Explainability
tools.one_line_profile: Explainability techniques for Graph Neural Networks in chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A collection of explainability techniques for Graph Networks, demonstrated on synthetic datasets and organic chemistry tasks to interpret model predictions and identify relevant molecular substructures.

tools.name: MolNet Geometric Lightning
tools.one_line_profile: MoleculeNet benchmarks using PyTorch Geometric and Lightning
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of MoleculeNet benchmarks utilizing PyTorch Lightning and Torch Geometric, providing a standardized workflow for evaluating molecular property prediction models.

tools.name: MDBenchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark tool for molecular dynamics simulations
tools.detailed_description: A tool to quickly generate, start, and analyze benchmarks for molecular dynamics simulations, helping researchers optimize simulation performance and resource usage on HPC systems.

tools.name: MolRep
tools.one_line_profile: Deep representation learning library for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for deep representation learning on molecules, supporting various downstream tasks like property prediction, integrating multiple state-of-the-art models.

tools.name: Chainer Chemistry
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library for biology and chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A library based on Chainer for deep learning applications in biology and chemistry, providing implementations of various graph convolution networks (GCNs) for molecular data.

tools.name: Chemprop
tools.one_line_profile: Message Passing Neural Networks (MPNN) library for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for training message passing neural networks (MPNNs) for molecular property prediction. It supports various molecular featurization methods, uncertainty estimation, and has been widely adopted as a baseline in AI for Science chemistry tasks.

tools.name: YANK
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated Python framework for alchemical free energy calculations
tools.detailed_description: An open, extensible Python framework for performing alchemical free energy calculations using molecular dynamics. It leverages GPU acceleration to facilitate efficient simulation of ligand binding and other molecular transformations.

tools.name: MolSetRep
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular Set Representation Learning library
tools.detailed_description: A library for encoding supramolecular systems using molecular set representation learning. It allows for the prediction of properties for mixtures and complex molecular systems by treating them as sets of molecules.

tools.name: DeepChem
tools.one_line_profile: Democratizing Deep-Learning for Drug Discovery, Quantum Chemistry, and Biology
tools.detailed_description: A high-quality, open-source toolchain that democratizes the use of deep learning in drug discovery, materials science, quantum chemistry, and biology. It provides a comprehensive suite of loaders, featurizers, splitters, and models.

tools.name: MoleculeNet
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark datasets and splits for molecular machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite for molecular machine learning, providing a wide range of datasets and splitting methods to evaluate the performance of molecular property prediction models. It serves as a standard evaluation platform in the field.

tools.name: DeepMD-kit
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning package for many-body potential energy representation and MD
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning package that generates many-body potential energy surfaces (PES) and force fields for molecular dynamics simulations. It bridges the gap between the accuracy of ab initio methods and the efficiency of classical force fields.

tools.name: DockString
tools.one_line_profile: Package for molecular docking with curated datasets and benchmarks
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that facilitates molecular docking and provides a highly curated dataset and realistic benchmark tasks for drug discovery. It aims to standardize the evaluation of machine learning models in structure-based drug design.

tools.name: Uni-Dock-Benchmarks
tools.one_line_profile: Curated datasets and benchmarks for Uni-Dock docking system
tools.detailed_description: A collection of datasets and benchmarking tests designed to evaluate the performance and accuracy of the Uni-Dock docking system. It supports continuous integration testing and comparative analysis for researchers.

tools.name: SEAL_OGB
tools.one_line_profile: SEAL implementation for link prediction on OGB datasets
tools.detailed_description: An open-source implementation of the SEAL (Subgraphs, Embeddings, and Attributes for Link prediction) framework, specifically optimized for link prediction tasks within the Open Graph Benchmark (OGB) ecosystem.

tools.name: Geo-DEG
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical grammar-induced geometry model for data-efficient molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework that leverages hierarchical grammar-induced geometry to improve data efficiency in molecular property prediction tasks, as presented at ICML 2023.

tools.name: OGB-LSC PCQM4Mv2
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale quantum chemistry dataset for graph machine learning benchmarking
tools.detailed_description: Part of the Open Graph Benchmark Large-Scale Challenge (OGB-LSC), this dataset (PCQM4Mv2) is designed to benchmark machine learning models on quantum chemistry tasks, specifically predicting DFT-calculated properties.

tools.name: Anti-TB Screening Data
tools.one_line_profile: Datasets and code for anti-tuberculosis virtual screening and molecular docking
tools.detailed_description: Contains datasets and machine learning workflows for identifying anti-tuberculosis activity in compounds, verified by molecular docking and dynamics simulations.

tools.name: BM5-clean
tools.one_line_profile: Cleaned Docking Benchmark 5 dataset for HADDOCK
tools.detailed_description: A cleaned version of the Docking Benchmark 5 (BM5) dataset, prepared specifically for use with the HADDOCK protein-protein docking software.

tools.name: MemCplxDB
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark dataset for membrane protein complex docking
tools.detailed_description: A curated benchmark dataset containing membrane protein complexes, designed for evaluating and developing molecular docking algorithms.

tools.name: Prot-DNABenchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark dataset for protein-DNA docking
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark dataset specifically curated for evaluating protein-DNA docking methods, maintained by the HADDOCK team.

tools.name: cyclic-peptides
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for cyclic peptide-protein complex docking
tools.detailed_description: A dataset and associated scripts for benchmarking docking protocols on cyclic peptide-protein complexes.

tools.name: Guacamole (HammerLab)
tools.one_line_profile: Spark-based somatic variant calling tool
tools.detailed_description: A somatic variant caller for NGS data built on Apache Spark, supporting multi-sample calling and local assembly.

tools.name: FG-BERT
tools.one_line_profile: Functional Group-based BERT for molecular representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A self-supervised molecular representation learning method that incorporates functional group information to improve molecular property prediction.

tools.name: HiGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical Informative Graph Neural Network for molecules
tools.detailed_description: A hierarchical graph neural network model equipped with feature-wise attention for molecular property prediction.

tools.name: Drug ID Mapping
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for cross-matching drug identifiers across multiple databases
tools.detailed_description: A utility to map and cross-match drug identifiers between major chemical databases including DrugBank, ChEMBL, PubChem, ZINC, and KEGG.

tools.name: AIMNet-X2D
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable 2D GNN framework for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A scalable 2D Graph Neural Network framework designed for efficient and accurate molecular property prediction, developed by the Isayev Lab.

tools.name: SFL
tools.one_line_profile: Out-of-distribution molecular representation learning framework
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a method for stretching the boundaries of structure and property coverage to improve out-of-distribution generalization in molecular representation learning.

tools.name: Lipophilicity Prediction
tools.one_line_profile: Multitask learning model for lipophilicity prediction
tools.detailed_description: Code for predicting lipophilicity using multitask learning and molecular substructure representations, presented at NeurIPS 2020 ML for Molecules Workshop.

tools.name: Carbon Data
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset of 22.9 million carbon atom environments
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale dataset containing 22.9 million carbon atom environments, useful for training machine learning potentials or analyzing carbon structures.

tools.name: Molecule Chef
tools.one_line_profile: Generative model for synthesizable molecules
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of 'A Model to Search for Synthesizable Molecules', designed to generate molecular structures that are chemically synthesizable.

tools.name: IFM
tools.one_line_profile: Deep model for molecular property prediction (NeurIPS 2023)
tools.detailed_description: Code for the NeurIPS 2023 paper 'Understanding the Limitations of Deep Models for Molecular Property Prediction', providing improved modeling approaches.

tools.name: ChemBench
tools.one_line_profile: Automated benchmark framework for evaluating LLMs on chemistry tasks
tools.detailed_description: ChemBench is a framework designed to evaluate the capabilities of Large Language Models (LLMs) in the domain of chemistry. It provides a suite of tasks and metrics to assess how well LLMs perform on chemical reasoning, knowledge retrieval, and problem-solving.

tools.name: torch-molecule
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library for molecular property prediction and representation learning
tools.detailed_description: torch-molecule is a PyTorch-based deep learning package designed for molecular discovery. It offers an sklearn-style interface to facilitate molecular property prediction, inverse design, and representation learning, making it accessible for researchers to build and test molecular models.

tools.name: LanczosNetwork
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Network implementation for molecular property prediction (QM8 benchmark)
tools.detailed_description: This repository contains the implementation of Lanczos Networks, a class of Graph Neural Networks designed to leverage the spectral properties of graphs. It is specifically applied to and benchmarked on quantum chemistry datasets like QM8 for predicting molecular properties.

tools.name: molecularGNN_3Dstructure
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Network for molecular property prediction using 3D structures
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network (GNN) implementation that explicitly incorporates 3D molecular structural information for predicting molecular properties. It serves as a solver for structure-property relationship modeling in computational chemistry.

tools.name: keras-molecules
tools.one_line_profile: Autoencoder for continuous molecular representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A Keras-based implementation of a Variational Autoencoder (VAE) for converting discrete molecular structures (SMILES) into continuous vector representations. This tool is widely used for molecular generation and latent space optimization tasks.

tools.name: a3fe
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Adaptive Absolute alchemical Free Energy calculator
tools.detailed_description: A3FE is a Python tool for automating the calculation of absolute alchemical free energies. It manages the setup and execution of molecular dynamics simulations required for free energy perturbation (FEP) or thermodynamic integration (TI) methods.

tools.name: FS-Mol
tools.one_line_profile: Few-Shot Learning Dataset and Benchmark for Molecules
tools.detailed_description: FS-Mol is a comprehensive dataset and benchmark suite designed for few-shot learning in drug discovery. It contains molecular compounds with activity measurements against various protein targets, enabling the evaluation of models that learn from limited data.

tools.name: TDC
tools.one_line_profile: Therapeutics Data Commons: Multimodal Foundation for Therapeutic Science
tools.detailed_description: Therapeutics Data Commons (TDC) is a comprehensive platform providing datasets and benchmarks for therapeutic machine learning. It covers a wide range of modalities and stages in drug discovery, including ADMET prediction, drug-target interaction, and molecular generation.

tools.name: MOSES
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking platform for molecular generation models
tools.detailed_description: Molecular Sets (MOSES) is a benchmarking platform to evaluate and compare machine learning models for molecular generation. It provides standard datasets, metrics, and baseline models to ensure reproducible research in generative chemistry.

tools.name: chem-dcat-ap
tools.one_line_profile: Metadata schema and extension for describing chemistry datasets
tools.detailed_description: An extension of the DCAT Application Profile combined with LinkML schema, designed by NFDI4Chem to provide standardized, chemistry-specific metadata for dataset description and interoperability.

tools.name: Antibody-Antigen Docking Benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark dataset and tools for antibody-antigen docking and affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark suite designed to evaluate computational methods for antibody-antigen docking and affinity prediction, facilitating the development of biologics.

tools.name: FragNet
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Network for interpretable molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network architecture designed for molecular property prediction that offers four levels of interpretability, aiding in the understanding of structure-property relationships.

tools.name: qm9pack
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for mining and handling the QM9 dataset
tools.detailed_description: A utility package designed to facilitate data mining and handling of the QM9 quantum chemistry dataset, streamlining access to molecular properties.

tools.name: smilite
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight interface for ZINC database SMILES retrieval
tools.detailed_description: A Python module that provides a simple interface to retrieve and compare SMILES strings of chemical compounds directly from the ZINC online database.

tools.name: Smiles2Dock
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale multi-task dataset for molecular docking
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale, multi-task dataset specifically curated for training and evaluating machine learning models for molecular docking tasks.

tools.name: rxn-reaction-preprocessing
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing utilities for chemical reaction datasets
tools.detailed_description: A library for standardizing, filtering, augmenting, and tokenizing chemical reaction datasets, preparing them for machine learning models.

tools.name: MADD
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-agent system for drug discovery tasks
tools.detailed_description: A multi-agent system framework designed to automate and optimize various tasks within the drug discovery pipeline.

tools.name: LigEGFR
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset and embedding for EGFR ligand bioactivity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A dataset and spatial graph embedding methodology for predicting the bioactivity of ligand molecules targeting the epidermal growth factor receptor (EGFR).

tools.name: MolPILE
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale diverse dataset for molecular representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale and diverse dataset specifically curated to support and benchmark molecular representation learning models.

tools.name: Benchmarking Molecular Models
tools.one_line_profile: Code for benchmarking pretrained molecular embedding models
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing the code and framework used for benchmarking various pretrained molecular embedding models, as presented in the associated research paper.

tools.name: ACANet
tools.one_line_profile: Activity-Cliff Awareness Graph Learning for Molecular Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework (Activity-Cliff Awareness Network) designed to improve molecular property prediction by explicitly handling activity cliffs in molecular graphs.

tools.name: ChemBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark datasets for molecular machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A collection of benchmark datasets including MoleculeNet and MolMapNet for evaluating machine learning models in chemistry and drug discovery.

tools.name: VSDS-VD
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for AI-powered virtual screening docking methods
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking framework and dataset for evaluating the performance of AI-based molecular docking methods specifically in the context of virtual screening.

tools.name: matbench-genmetrics
tools.one_line_profile: Metrics for benchmarking generative materials models
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing standardized metrics for evaluating generative models in materials science, inspired by Guacamol for chemistry.

tools.name: SpectroChemPy
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for processing and analyzing spectroscopic data
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework dedicated to processing, analyzing, and modeling various types of spectroscopic data (IR, NMR, UV-Vis, etc.) in chemistry.

tools.name: PAR-NeurIPS21
tools.one_line_profile: Property-Aware Relation Networks for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Property-Aware Relation Networks (PAR) for few-shot molecular property prediction, as presented at NeurIPS 2021.

tools.name: mddatasetbuilder
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset builder for neural network potentials from MD trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A tool to construct reference datasets for training neural network potentials by processing LAMMPS molecular dynamics trajectories.

tools.name: trident-chemwidgets
tools.one_line_profile: Jupyter Widgets for interactive molecular dataset visualization
tools.detailed_description: A set of Jupyter widgets designed to facilitate the interactive exploration and visualization of molecular datasets within notebooks.

tools.name: soapgp
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular property prediction using Gaussian Processes with SOAP kernel
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation for predicting molecular properties using Gaussian Processes combined with the Smooth Overlap of Atomic Positions (SOAP) kernel.

tools.name: Knowledge-based-BERT
tools.one_line_profile: K-BERT model for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Knowledge-based BERT (K-BERT) adapted for molecular property prediction tasks, integrating domain knowledge into the pre-training.

tools.name: MoleRec
tools.one_line_profile: Substructure-aware molecular representation for drug recommendation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of MoleRec, a combinatorial drug recommendation system that utilizes substructure-aware molecular representation learning.

tools.name: GLAM
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive graph learning method for molecular interactions and properties predictions
tools.detailed_description: GLAM (Graph Learning with Adaptive Mechanisms) is a deep learning framework designed to predict molecular interactions and properties by utilizing adaptive graph learning techniques to capture complex molecular structures.

tools.name: TrimNet
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular representation learning from triplet messages for biomedicine
tools.detailed_description: TrimNet is a graph neural network model that learns molecular representations by focusing on triplet messages within the molecular graph, specifically tailored for biomedical applications such as property prediction.

tools.name: MGSSL
tools.one_line_profile: Motif-based Graph Self-Supervised Learning for Molecular Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: MGSSL implements a self-supervised learning framework for molecular graphs that leverages motif-level information to enhance representation learning for downstream property prediction tasks.

tools.name: Molecular-graph-BERT
tools.one_line_profile: Semi-supervised learning for molecular property prediction using BERT architecture
tools.detailed_description: This tool adapts the BERT architecture for molecular graphs, enabling semi-supervised learning to predict molecular properties by capturing structural dependencies within molecules.

tools.name: Meta-MGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Few-Shot Graph Learning for Molecular Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: Meta-MGNN is a meta-learning framework designed for molecular property prediction in few-shot scenarios, allowing the model to generalize to new tasks with limited labeled data.
